description:
Ryuuko rediscovers Erio`s infamy. She is worried that Makoto might get ostracized at school because of Erio`s past. Also, Maekawa-san decides to visit Makoto`s place. Ryuuko, who has conflicted feelings for Makoto, begins to show signs of irritation...
Source: Funimation

titles.title: リュウ『コ』さんの, なんちゅーか, もやーっと
